title: Silent Rain
description:
You are a Seeker working for “the Society”, an organization facing otherworldly phenomena that need to remain secret. Recently, a strange contamination was brought to our world by a phenomenon called the Silent Rain.
In this challenging and immersive experience, explore abandoned locations, solve puzzles , and gather information while trying to survive the threat lurking in the dark . Team up with friends or brave the terror alone to uncover the truth about the Silent Rain.
DOUBLE TROUBLE
Explore two distinct maps, each with unique settings, mechanics, puzzles , and monsters. From the cramped, secluded House where the slightest noise brings danger, to the labyrinthine abandoned Metro where even the walls seem to watch you.
EASY TO SCREAM, HARD TO MASTER
Silent Rain is designed to be a challenging experience . Every failed attempt provides more insight for future runs. Items, traps, and key elements are randomized, making every game unique. Master the mechanics and conquer the leaderboard to show off your skills !
